arts.ttl: O'Brien header extends Everton's unbeaten streak
arts.sum: The defender’s first Everton goal extended the Toffees’ unbeaten streak to seven Premier League matches, while denying their hosts a third straight top-flight win. Everton capitalised on that let-off by clawing themselves level 13 minutes from time, as a well-worked move culminated in O’Brien losing his marker to head home Mykolenko’s cross.

arts.ttl: Brentford's Yoane Wissa breaks personal Premier League record in Everton draw
arts.sum: Brentford forward Yoane Wissa broke a personal scoring record in Wednesday's 1-1 draw against Everton at the Gtech Community Stadium.

arts.ttl: Frank praises ‘outstanding’ Flekken after Brentford draw
arts.sum: Thomas Frank praised goalkeeper Mark Flekken following Brentford’s 1-1 draw with Everton. Flekken made three important saves from Everton striker Beto after the forward ran clean through on goal on each occasion. The Dutchman’s fine display came after consecutive clean sheets, against West Ham and Leicester. arts.ttl: Everton 'dressing room confidence has risen' - Moyes
arts.sum: Everton boss David Moyes says his side is showing "confidence" and "resilience" after extending their unbeaten Premier League run with a 1-1 draw against Brentford.
